title: Maritime Safety Training: Simulation Education Based on Axiomatic Design and Fuzzy Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Maritime Terminology and Understanding of Safety Procedures
context.additional_context: Practical training focused on responding to hazardous environments, utilizing smartphone-based VR content

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real maritime accident scenarios with 80% accuracy to identify risk factors.
Learners can diagnose at least three flaws in training processes by applying axiomatic design methodology.
Decision-making accuracy based on safety procedure priorities can be achieved at over 75% using fuzzy set theory
Emergency response procedures can be successfully performed three consecutive times in a VR simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
